# Scutumsuit
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Very rare
#Special-Item-Rarity/Very-rare

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
These *[[Mycelosuits|mycelosuits]]* are made from the dense caps of the [[Scutum Boletus|scutum boletus]] ([[Scutum Boletus|Shield Mushroom]]) and provide the wearer with a shield of vines that acts as a shield +3 These suits are made from [[Scutum Boletus|shield mushroom]] cap ([[Scutum Boletus|scutum boletus]]).
